notes.title: Funding
notes.p: We would like to acknowledge the financial support received from the University of KwaZulu-Natal (UKZN), Pietermaritzburg and the National Research Foundation (NRF: Indigenous Knowledge System grant UID: 93175) Pretoria, South Africa. We would also like to acknowledge the support received from the ERDF (Czech) project “Development of pre-applied research in Nanotechnogy and Biotechnology” (No. CZ.02.1.01/0.0/0.0/17 _048/0007323).
